title: Strengthening Practical AI Competencies: Contextual Learning of Design Knowledge: Situational Understanding through Language Domains

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational design principles and understanding of linguistic structures
context.additional_context: Advanced AI/machine learning technical course for AI/ML practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can analyze the interrelationships between design elements and linguistic structures through various visual representations (floor plans, elevations, 3D modeling).
Learners can explain contextually how design decisions impact linguistic communication based on case studies of real-world architectural projects.
Learners can reinterpret and resolve problems arising in design contexts through linguistic frameworks via collaborative activities.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
